summary: Welcome to MetallicAcid\'s Nexusmods ENB preset! This ENB is based upon the 0.113 binary, and is feature friendly, including SSAO and SMAA, among others! I hope that you will have as much enjoyment using it as I have. So please, try it out! Now using Climates of Tamriel!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Welcome to my humble page!


I have now finished my ENB preset! 2012-11-17!
Please try it out! :)


[IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/5539/tesv2012080216311519.jpg[/IMG]


This is my personal ENB that I have tweaked to my personal tastes. In my preset, I wanted to achieve brighter days, darkerer nights, stronger colors and subtle but realistic lighting.


[youtube]WFBD59ksjL4[/youtube]
Thanks Hodilton for the great vid!

This is still a WIP, and look to update this page as much as possible! So be sure to add this to your watch list! 
Please enjoy. Thanks for looking!


----------------------------
PC Specs:
Intel 2500k
GTX 670
8gb 1600mhz
Outdoors 45-65 fps
indoors 60-85fps
----------------------------


[/center]


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENB FEATURES:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SSAO
Indirect lighting
Sun \"God\" rays
SMAA
Extremely detailed shadows
My personal .ini files


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please note, that due to expressed word of the creater of the ENB series, those who are wanting to use this preset will need to visit [URL=www.enbdev.com][/URL] and download the associated 0.113 binaries.

All files  should be placed into the Skyrim root folder. This is the folder that has TESV.exe.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Boris Vorontsov - ENB!!!!!
Matso - Great Bloom code.
HeliosDoubleSix - Fantastic shaders.
Hodilton - Fantastic video mate! Thanks.
ENBdev.com members - Tips and comments.
If I have missed anyone please inform me and I will give credit where credit is most certainly due!


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
QUICK PICTURE SHOWOFF TIME :)
